suspect_1.name: Mr. Smith
suspect_1.motive: Desires the heirloom for personal gain.

dialogues.greeting: I didn’t take anything, I swear!
dialogues.alibi: I was at the café during the robbery.

suspect_2.name: Ms. Johnson
suspect_2.motive: Hates the family and wants revenge.

dialogues.greeting: Why are you asking me? I’m innocent!

suspect_3.name: Detective Brown
suspect_3.motive: Trying to solve the case, but is hiding something.

dialogues.greeting: I’m just here to help, nothing more.
dialogues.alibi: I was working on another case nearby.
